/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the buildings appear taller and more imposing. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
